mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmAcqieHstDao.selectListCount */ COUNT(1) FROM CRM_ACQIE_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS B ON A.ACQIE_ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO AND B.CUST_STATUS_CD != '003'

ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
